Name: Putra
Phrase: I'm late, I'm late~! If I don't get there in time, I'll be late for my extra classes~!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Alors! A girl with pasta in her mouth just ran out of the corner!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Aduh-duh-duh...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Huh... that didn't hurt much. Feels like I hit some kind of large cushion, went straight under me and softened my landing?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You dived face-first into me, and the thing you just landed on is not a cushion, that's my chest.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Woah, sorry! I was so engrossed in my breakfast that I didn't look around at all.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Oh, my gosh, Vivienne! You're covered in blood! Are you all right? Did my fork stuck in you somewhere?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Eh, I'm fine. This red stuff is not blood, it's the meat sauce you're eating, Putra.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I see, then it's not a problem!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, I'm certainly glad we didn't hurt each other♪

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Non are you really delusional enough to think I was going to say that!? Of course this is a problem! Where in the world do kids eat pasta while running off to school!?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We do have pasta in Verforet and there might be someone doing that, oui, but I've never even seen a girl eat that much meat sauce while running down corridors!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Kind of a rare gem to see Vivienne doing straight man comedy skits.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Stop being amused and help me clean up.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Alors... I just had a bath and I'm covered in meat sauce... I have to go back to the dormitory and change again.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Good morning-! Let's get on with our day!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Huh? It smells really nice. Sniff, this mixture of tomatoes and perfume smells like...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Zvarri! It's Vivienne, bathed in meat sauce!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Correct!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Waaah-! Paddington! In your head! You've got a fork in your head!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Oh, true, tis but a scratch on my chignon.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: I don't know which one of you gourmets did this, but none of you can eat my chignon. I've said this a long time ago.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: The three stooges have been making a spectacular comedy show all morning, as usual.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Vivienne is covered in meat sauce and Paddington has a fork in her head. This is all quite saucy. Let's have pasta for breakfast today.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hey you, we've got remedial classes coming up, so stop messing about. Finchley will give you girls a good scolding again.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Oh, and the mini moms are here too.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Who are you calling mini moms? Don't treat me and Yoshino like a set.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Souyo souyo~ Yakky-tan is crazy in her dreams with her sister, Bestyakh~

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But Yakutsk slept with Yoshino yesterday too, didn't you?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Um... how did you know about that, Vivienne?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Non~ was just a guess.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Wh-What the heck~!?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Maa maa, please let that one slide. Yakky-tan is already conditioned to a state where she can't sleep without Yoshino's tail.
The Special Steel Squad successfully cleared the Sea of Mist by freeing Ricardo Trevithick, who became a monster inside the Giant Tree of St. Iris.

Queensway, Yoshino, Yakutsk, Putra and Vivienne, the five who were the main force behind the Giant Tree campaign, enjoyed a short holiday and were then forced to take on devilish remedial classes. The reason for this was their overwhelming lack of classroom credits due to the continuous expeditionary missions.

An elite unit formed by the best and brightest from all over the country. The Allied Forces' Special Steel Squad is such an elite unit, but many of these elite members are surprisingly poor at studies.

Name: Putra
Phrase: And I, Putra, is said to be a representative of this group! I often sleep during classes!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: And following Putra is me! People often told me, 'You look like you can study well'. While I take my classes seriously, my test scores are low for some reason♪

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The last fortress is Yoshino. Don't understand what is written inside textbooks.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Even so, we have managed to get this far thanks to the loving lectures by Instructor Finchley, who has given us plenty of candies and lashes.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Instuctor Finchley is strict but gentle. She'll be a little lenient and say, 'It can't be helped...' when it comes to Yoshino♪

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's why Finchley's remedial classes are so likeable. Compared to Ohana's combat training, it's a piece of cake~♪

Name: Mary
Phrase: I don't hand out candies or lashes in my classes. I use my sword on students who can't keep up instead.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Have we entered the wrong classroom?

Name: Mary
Phrase: No, there's no mistake. I came to the place exactly where Conductor told me to go. Isn't that right, Conductor?
Absolutely. It's the right place and the right time. I'm sorry I'm asking you to do this out of the blue, Mary. I know you still have a lot of things to clear up.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Don't worry about that. I'm a member of the SSS now. I'll do whatever I can to help.

Name: Mary
Phrase: So, starting today, I'm Mary Rosegarden, who's going to be in charge of your remedial classes. I'll be filling in for Finchley when she's not here.

Name: Putra
Phrase: What's the reason for this!?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I never thought I'd see the day Mary would teach us.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Queensway will be so happy, she'll dislodge her joints if she knew.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Come to think of it, I don't see Queensway here. I don't think she's the sort of girl to be late for classes.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's definitely unusual for Queensway to be late. Normally she's already here with her prep work done before anyone else even entered.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Queensway said she was going to go to the training grounds for a bit of practice. Maybe she went back to get something she forgot?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: No. Even if she did forget something, there's no way Queensway would be late for the start of the school day. She'll even consider the possibilities of multiple emergencies and will always try to be early.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Now I feel sorry for eating pasta on my way to school.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: I'm a bit worried. Mary sensei, what do you think? Should we all go and pick up Queensway together?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes, that's a good idea. It could be that she's fallen ill, and we should probably go and check on her just in case.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Bozhe, what's going on, Queensway? Mary's going to give us a lesson...
